name: Koffing
flavorText:
Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.

previous.name: Lickitung
previous.flavorText:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

next.name: Weezing
next.flavorText:
Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.
